title: Nero Video 2016 17.0.17 Portable
description:
Nero Video 2016 will turn videos into extraordinary movies with easy to advanced video editing features, drag and drop, Picture-in-Picture effect templates, multi-track editing and customizable overlays and effects with full keyframe control. Import video from digital stills, camera, smartphones and camcorder to playback or edit on your PC.	

Nero Video 2016 lets you effortlessly and seamlessly convert music and videos to virtually any format for playback. Import and convert Microsoft PowerPoint presentations to DVD or AVCHD TV playback.

Integrated one-click access for adding any photo, video or music file to your projects. Movies and photo slideshows will look their best with tools to help you edit and create show-stopping projects with ease. Turn your home movies into real Hollywood blockbusters.

With the packed-full Nero Video 2016, you will create videos with amazing animations and publish or burn them in a snap. It even supports Ultra HD (4K) video and includes great themes, video stabilizers and effect packages.

Nero Video 2016 allows fully to control authoring design and layout, enhanced navigation links, add additional graphic objects, texts, and more. Add professional touches to your videos with hundreds of premium video and audio effects, templates, themes and clipart.

Nero Video 2016 Features:

Powerful Video Editing. Best Results

4K editing is now an integral part of Nero Video
Import and optimize Windows Live Movie Maker projects
Get professional results fast, thanks to Nero Videoâ€™s express editing mode
Enjoy hundreds of professional drag & drop, video, transition, text and PiP effects
Powerful multitrack editing with complete control and first-grade keyframe editing
High quality video formats including AVCHD 2.0 progressive format
Hardware optimized encoding with your GPGPU capable graphics cards

Create and Burn First-Grade DVDs and Blu-rays

Superb disc authoring and burning with Hollywood-style 2D and 3D menus templates
Dedicated content screen for quick arrangement of assets and chapter creation
Fully customize your menus in advanced authoring mode
Burn DVD, AVCHD and Blu-ray Discs
Burn Blu-ray Discs with 24p progressive cinema quality
Output AVCHD to flash drive
Edit and Burn Microsoft PowerPoint Projects to video discs

Premium Content and Templates Included

Now includes hundreds of effects, video effects, PiP, transitions and more!
Nero Retro Films package with great video and slideshow templates, video effects and disc menu templates
Nero Tilt Shift effects to make your photos look like miniatures

Get Your Videos, Photos and Music Sorted

Now manage and tag your photos and videos by locations (â€œGeotaggingâ€)
Instant access to files in your Nero Cloud for browsing and adding to your media library

Plays Everything. Everywhere

Now streams your files to all your TVs and media player devices, thanks to all-new auto transcoding
Streams your files to your Android and iOS device, thanks to the new Nero MediaHome Receiver app
Even play 4K video
